title: Government will not 'be held to ransom' by doctors strike, says Wes Streeting
description: The health secretary is refusing to make concessions on pay after the BMA announced a further walkout.
content:

title: Royal Navy to spend £150m on mine-hunting drones amid Russia threat
description: A fleet of cutting-edge vessels could be used for clearing mines in conflict zones such as the Black Sea
content:
Britain will acquire a fleet of underwater drones for minehunting as part of a £150m upgrade of the Royal Navy amid growing threats from Russia.
